metadataAttributes.Title: Healing with the Arts
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Through art projects—including visual arts, dance, writing, and music—along with spiritual practices and guided imagery, Healing With the Arts gives you the tools to heal what you need to heal in your life: physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Mary Rockwood Lane, PhD, RN, FAAN
